about_the_game:
Fall Into Insanity is a single-player first-person horror game that takes advantage of Unreal Engine 5. You and your friends love to explore abandoned buildings but things go wrong when you decide to leave your friends to head back to the dorm for the night. You wake up and they have yet to return, so you set out to look for them in the last place they planned to explore the previous night, Rosewood Mental Hospital.



Find Your Friends
Your friends never returned to the campus so you set out to look for them thinking you can handle the situation on your own without any outside help. However things take a turn for the worst when you reach Rosewood Mental Hospital and something sinister begins to unravel.




Did Your Friends Survive?
You explore a dark and twisted environment as the story to your friend's disappearance unfolds, All you can do is hope they somehow made it out with their life and with their sanity in tact.





HIDE
Hiding might be the only thing that can save you at times so make sure to find the best spots or else you may lose a lot more than just your life






The Power Of Unreal Engine 5
Using the power of Unreal Engine 5, the game will support lumen global illumination technology to enhance the atmosphere of the game through lighting and more. Unreal Engine 5 allows us the chance to pour even more detail into the game than we previously imagined so we are excited to show just that when it is ready.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features depictions of Blood and Corpses
